content: The 1976 film Rocky, starring Sylvester Stallone, tells the story of a small-time boxer from where?

The 1976 film Rocky, starring Sylvester Stallone, tells the story of a small-time boxer from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The movie is set primarily in the city of Philadelphia and its surrounding areas, and it showcases the underdog journey of Rocky Balboa as he prepares for and faces the world heavyweight champion, Apollo Creed.
